snippet: Merging a love of cycling with a cross-country writing project, Maya Stein is riding 40 miles a day for 40 days, until she reaches Milwaukee, stopping along the way to hear others’ tales.
abstract: Maya Stein embarks on a cross-country bicycle ride that merges her love of cycling and writing; TypeRider project will last 40 days, with stops to allow people to take turns on a manual typewriter, expressing themselves; Stein's final destination will be Milwaukee, where the design for the first mass-produced typewriter was developed in the 1860s.
lead_paragraph: Merging a love of cycling with a cross-country writing project, Maya Stein is riding 40 miles a day for 40 days, until she reaches Milwaukee, stopping along the way to hear others’ tales.

headline.seo: With Typewriter in Tow, Cyclist Maya Stein Nurtures Creativity
headline.main: With a Typewriter in Tow, a Cyclist Fosters Creativity
headline.print_headline: With a Typewriter in Tow, a Cyclist Fosters Creativity
